description:
Kazuma invites Yuka on a picnic to take a break from studying. Yuka isn`t into the idea at all at first, but Chi-chan says he wants to go to a flower park. So they also invite Suo-kun and Akari-chan along, and the whole gang sets off for a picnic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Chaos Ensues in a Battle for Love?!
Gekitotsu! Koi no Battle de Oosawagi Dechi!?
ゲキトツ! 恋のバトルで大騒ぎでち!?
